name: Lead Sync – WPForms to Jetpack CRM
author: Jahidur Nadim

sections.installation:
1. Automatic
    Go to Dashboard and under Plugins menu click ‘Add new’ and upload sync-wpforms-jetcrm zip file.

OR

  1. Manually
    Upload it on wp-content/plugins/ directory

Activate it, and make sure Jetpack CRM and WPForms are also enabled. You’re done!
sections.faq:
Does it sync existing leads from WPForms?

No, it will only sync new leads after enabling this plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Release Date – 10/13/2022
  • Initial release.

1.0.2

  • Release Date – 04/26/2024
  • Made compatible with new WordPress version.
sections.description:
Use WPForms to collect leads info and save time by automating your lead generation process.

This plugin converts form-fillers into customers in your database!

Automatically create leads from the WPForms form completions.

A form is much more than an email hole. A form is a portal, (stick with me on this), it’s a way that a totally distant person can reach you, simply by them entering their details.

What’s more, that person could become a customer… But only if the process is managed. That’s why Jetpack CRM and WPForms Forms are a supreme business-system match.

Automate Lead Collection

With the WPForms to Jetpack CRM sync plugin, you can ensure that your leads get added. No missed contacts. No Work is Required! Create a WPForms form for your customer data. Insert it onto your website and with the plugin installed, start generating leads.

Features include:

  • Sync lead to Jetpack CRM from WPForms lead generation form.
  • No configuration required.

Required Plugins

Jetpack CRM
WPForms

Support

For customer support please send me an email at: jahidurnadim@gmail.com
